item.title: Scala hello world web api with http4s
item.description: Build.sbt scalaVersion := "2.13.6" // Also supports 2.12.x val http4sVersion = "0.23.1" // Only necessary for SNAPSHOT releases resolvers += Resolver.sonatypeRepo("snapshots") libraryDependencies ++= Seq( "org.http4s" %% "http4s-dsl" % http4sVersion, "org.http4s" %% "http4s-blaze-server" % http4sVersion, "org.http4s" %% "http4s-blaze-client" % http4sVersion ) Server.scala package bkr.joker.webapi import cats.effect._ import org.http4s.blaze.server._ import scala.concurrent.ExecutionContext.global // import cats.effect._ import org.http4s.HttpRoutes import org.http4s.dsl.io._ import org.http4s.implicits._ object Server extends IOApp { def plot(name: String, lastname: String): String = { s"All work and no play makes $name $lastname a dull boy.
